I’m sure you know what’s next, if you don’t, you didn’t read our rules! All takers must be completely naked. 11.content:
Musicians it is.

In doing so you left yourself wide open to attack as within seconds you are on the floor following a huge kick to the balls. 113.content:
"What? Bet you thought I was really nice didn’t you?" Cheryl asks and you have to admit, you did.

"Of course you did, everyone does. It gives me a huge advantage in this, no-one has ever made it past me and you wont be the first. Want to know why?" Cheryl asks to which you nod in response.

"Because I'm an expert at making men fail. Some of the ladies here will try and beat you into submission, others will try and humiliate you until you quit, I'm going to do something different. I'm going to make you cum and very quickly." Cheryl explains.

"Only last week I broke my own record for fastest cum. It was only 62 seconds from flaccid to fail. I feel like beating that right now." Cheryl continues as her sweet voice seems almost incapable of saying those words but yet she definitely is. Cheryl moves towards you and gently puss you back until you hit a wall. Within seconds Cheryl has you tied to the wall and completely exposed and helpless in front of her. Cheryl pulls up a small stool for her to sit on before dawning a black lace glove onto her right hand.

Cheryl clicks her fingers and a large clock appears on the wall in front of you as Cheryl begins to go to work while whispering sweet nothings the whole time. Within seconds you realise you are in trouble as you're already rock hard and she has barely started. Her delicate touch and sweet sexy voice is too much to take, no wonder nobody makes it past. You are already right on the edge and Cheryl knows it as she picks up the pace ever so slightly. Desperate to avoid setting a new record at least, you look up at the clock and to your horror see that only 15 seconds have passed and already you're about to cum.

It's now only a matter of time before your prize money is cut in half and you make a mental note to avoid the Musicians the next time around.

info.brief_description: Do you think you have what it takes to outlast the females who await?
info.description:
Your challenge is to enter, complete the tasks and escape in one piece. However, any man who fails to complete the challenge is locked in the dungeon forever where they are used by the Ladies of the house whenever they are needed. You can fail tasks very easily as well. If you cum without permission, that’s a fail and it's off to the dungeon with you. If you just cant take it anymore and want it to end, you can announce that you forfeit and guess what? It's off to the dungeon with you! If you wish to avoid the dungeon, you had better be capable of following orders and following them quickly. The Ladies can fail you if they feel you are not up to the challenge anymore. You have no say in this so it’s in your best interests not to let it get to that stage.

The only other rule we have is that all takers must be completely naked at all times.

What do you get should you complete the challenge? Riches beyond your wildest dreams. But, everytime you fail and have to start over, your prize money is cut in half.

Just how much are you willing to take to gain the prize?

Do you dare take the challenge?

+Rules+
Only yourself and female celebrities are allowed.
The females are always in charge.
It's the females job to make you fail, meaning they can do anything to you.
No Shrinking.
No Males (Other than yourself).
No Death.
Have fun.
